description: Through-hole resistor. Non-polarized - can be connected in either direction. Common values: 220, 330, 1K, 10K ohms.

pins.label: Terminal 1
pins.description: First terminal. Resistors are non-polarized, so terminals are interchangeable.

pins.label: Terminal 2
pins.description: Second terminal. Resistors are non-polarized, so terminals are interchangeable.
